content: row 3 stitches in each of the 2 bottom corners and evenly across bottom of bonnet starting again at bottom right corner you should be right there otherwise fasten_off and join in bottom right corner 3 double_crochet in each stitch across brim part to the bottom left corner to make the little brim fasten_off and weave in ends now make a chain the desired length to go around neck and allow for a bow you can either make a length of chains stitches or even make a length of chain stitches and go back and single_crochet in each across to make a thicker chain the way i like to do it is a little different chain 2 then make a single_crochet in the back loop of the first chain then take your hook and single_crochet in the side of the first one like this tl where the t is is the bar you crochet over keep doing a single_crochet in the side of the previous single_crochet until you have the desired length i find that this makes a nice solid tie and looks pretty too run your tie through the bottom 1st purple row and pull slightly to gather bottom of bonnet put on your furfriends head attention please don t leave this on your friend unattended as bad things could happen you never know what kitties will do this is mainly for those camera moments or dress up starlight here is the other inspiration for this we are hoping to change this habit before our first grandbaby gets here in a couple of months ©deadblackroses4me this pattern may be freely shared
